metadata.title: CVE-2020-11669 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.2 on the powerpcplatform. arch/powerpc/kernel/idle_book3s.S does not have save/restorefunctionality for PNV_POWERSAVE_AMR, PNV_POWERSAVE_UAMOR, andPNV_POWERSAVE_AMOR, aka CID-53a712bae5dd.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-11669` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-101-generic - 4.15.0-101.102
linux-image-4.15.0-101-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-101.102
linux-image-4.15.0-101-lowlatency - 4.15.0-101.102
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-101-generic - 4.15.0-101.102
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-101-lowlatency - 4.15.0-101.102
No subscription required

linux-image-5.3.0-26-generic - 5.3.0-26.28~18.04.1
linux-image-5.3.0-26-generic-lpae - 5.3.0-26.28~18.04.1

No subscription required
